Title: Burning Ice
Description:
Whatever magic the djaradin are employing is lighting the ice on fire out there, $n.

We can't let this spread to the wider Span. It has to be stopped before it consumes everything.

Gather as much water as you can while on that drake of yours and drown the fires. Hopefully that will be enough to extinguish them.
ObjectivesText: Extinguish fires across the djaradin camp.
